Create a unique thermos design that incorporates sustainable materials and reduces plastic waste.
Develop a line of thermoses with customizable insulation options for different types of beverages and temperatures.
Design a thermos that doubles as a portable stove, allowing users to heat up food and drinks on-the-go.
Create a thermos that can be used to keep vaccines cold during transportation, helping to combat vaccine shortages in developing countries.
Develop a thermos with built-in sensors that monitor the temperature of the contents inside and send alerts if it falls outside of safe ranges.
